name: Time Flies (Hodag Interactive)
description:
"Time Flies" is a 2D platformer where the only punishment for missing jumps is losing time. No bottomless pits or spike traps, just falling back to earlier in the level. Play the preview alpha build of "Time Flies".

  • 3 ways to play:
    • Speedrun Mode, where there is a timer and menus are removed between levels.
    • Select Level, or normal mode where the player has limited time to finish levels and any level can be selected.
    • Practice Level, where levels can be played without timers and the player can easily skip to different parts of the level.

Game Controls

A: move  left

D: move  right

Spacebar: jump

Left Ctrl: skip back in level (Practice Level)

Left Alt: skip forward in level (Practice Level)

This is a preview alpha build of the game. If players show interest in the game, more levels will be added at a later time.
